Common.photoPermissionDescription: Enable myTNB to access your camera roll to upload photos and save ones you’ve taken with the app.

Common.bcrmMessage: BRCM will be down for maintenance purpose
Common.maintenanceMsg: System is under maintenance. Please try again later. We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you.

Hint.mobileNumber: Please include the country code of your phone number.

Error.minimumMandatoryPayment: Minimum amount must be at least {0}
Error.minimumPayAmount: Minimum amount cannot be lower than RM 1.00
Error.emptyNickname: Account nickname cannot be empty. Please enter valid nickname and try adding your account again.
Error.invalidNickname: Invalid characters. Use letters or numbers only.
Error.duplicateNickname: Nickname already used. Please create a new one.
Error.refreshMessage: This page must be tired. Tap the button below to help it out.
Error.serviceErrorDefaultMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.

DashboardHome.refreshMessage: Uh oh, looks like this page is unplugged. Refresh to stay plugged in!
DashboardHome.tutorialNoAcctDesc: Add an electricity account to myTNB and you’ll have access to your usage and all services offered.
DashboardHome.tutorialSingleAcctDesc: View a summary of all your linked electricity accounts here.
DashboardHome.tutorialThreeAcctsDesc: View a summary of all your linked electricity accounts here. Tap “Add” to link an account to myTNB.
DashboardHome.tutorialMoreAcctsDesc: View a summary of all your linked electricity accounts here.
DashboardHome.tutorialQuickAccessDesc: Tap “Add” to link an account to myTNB. Use “Search” to look for a specific one! Just type in the nickname or account number.
DashboardHome.tutorialQuickActionDesc: Get all of the services myTNB has to offer. New features are highlighted so you don’t miss out on anything!
DashboardHome.tutorialNeedHelpDesc: We’ve highlighted some of the most commonly asked questions for you to browse through.

SSMROnboarding.onboardingTitle2: Why should I enable this service?
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription1: Self Meter Reading is a service you can enable to easily read and submit your own meter readings. We will send you a reminder when it's time to submit.
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription2: You get estimated bills when TNB meter readers can’t get access to your meter. With this service, you will always get bills with accurate readings.

SSMRApplication.terminateTitle: We’re sorry to see you go! Can you tell us why you want to stop this service?
SSMRApplication.tncUnsubscribe: By submitting, you are agreeing to the TNB’s Terms of Use, Privacy policy, Anti-Spam Policy and Personal Data Protection Policy.
SSMRApplication.tncSubscribe: By submitting, you are agreeing to the Self Meter Reading Terms and Conditions, TNB’s Terms of Use, Privacy policy, Anti-Spam Policy and Personal Data Protection Policy.
SSMRApplication.editContactInfo: By editing, you will update your myTNB profile and electricity account contact details.

Status.ssmrApplySuccessMessage: We have received your request to starting the Self Meter Reading service. You’ll receive a notification when your request is successful!
Status.ssmrApplyFailMessage: It looks like we can't process your application at the moment.
Status.ssmrDiscontinueSuccessMessage: We have received your request to stop this service. For your reference you may keep the service request number below.
Status.ssmrDiscontinueFailMessage: It looks like we can't process your application at the moment.
Status.ssmrReadingSuccessMessage: Thank you for your meter reading submission. We’ll notify you when your bill is ready.
Status.ssmrReadingFailMessage: It looks like we can’t validate your meter reading at the moment.

SSMRReadingHistory.subTitle: I want to read my own meter for:
SSMRReadingHistory.enableSSMRDescription: Self meter reading service has not been started for this electricity account yet. Tap below to start!
SSMRReadingHistory.noEligibleAccount: Looks like your accounts aren’t eligible to start Self Meter Reading service
SSMRReadingHistory.noHistoryData: Looks like you have no meter reading history at the moment.
SSMRReadingHistory.tutorialHeaderTitle: Your reading status at a glance.
SSMRReadingHistory.tutorialHeaderDesc: Switch between your accounts and get an overview of your meter reading status here.

SMREligibiltyPopUpDetails.Title: Why are some of my accounts not here?
SMREligibiltyPopUpDetails.Description: We took the liberty to only show you electricity accounts that are eligble for the Self Meter Reading service. Click here to learn more about its eligibility.

SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle1: Alright, what do I need to read?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle2: But wait, how do I read my meter?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle3: How do I enter these values?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription1: You'll need to read 3 reading values (kWh, kVARh, kW). Your meter will automatically flash one after the other.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription2: You can enter each reading manually or just take/upload a photo, and we’ll do the reading for you.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription3: Enter the numbers according to its unit in the input. You’ll see your previous month's reading as a reference.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription4: Your meter will display the kWh reading by default. Enter the reading manually or just take/upload a photo, and we’ll do the reading for you.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription5: For manual reading, enter the kWh numbers in the input. You’ll see your previous month's reading as a reference.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.headerDescription: Take or upload photos, or manually enter your meter reading for each respective unit.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.note: Note: Please round up the numbers if the reading values are showing decimal points on your meter.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.manualInputTitle: Please enter your meter reading for the unit(s) below.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.ocrDownMessage: Photo submission is currently unavailable. Please enter your reading manually below.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tutorialReadMeterDesc: Enter according to its unit(s). You’ll see your previous month's reading as a reference.

SSMRCaptureMeter.ocrReading: Please wait for a moment while we read your photos…
SSMRCaptureMeter.singleTakePhotoDescription: Take a photo of the reading value you see on your meter.
SSMRCaptureMeter.editDescription: You can select a photo to delete and retake or adjust it before submission.
SSMRCaptureMeter.multiTakePhotoDescription: There will be {0} different units. Take a photo of the 1st unit you see.
SSMRCaptureMeter.multiTakeNextPhotoDescription: Great! Now take a photo of the next unit you see.
SSMRCaptureMeter.singularOnto: On to the final unit {0} now.
SSMRCaptureMeter.pluralOnto: On to the next units {0} and {1}.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Be sure to upload a straight-facing photo containing the value. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take these photos?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description:
You'll need to submit {0} different meter reading values ({1}).

Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the values with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take this photo?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the value with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description:
You'll need to submit {0} different meter reading values ({1}).

Be sure to upload straight-facing photos containing the values. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take these photos?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the values with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Be sure to upload straight-facing photos containing the values. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SelectElectricityAccounts.accountsMissing: Why are some of my accounts not here?

UsageView.accountsMissing: Why are some of my accounts not here?
UsageView.disconnectionMsg:
What does this mean?

Your electricity has been disconnected and is unavailable. This was not caused by a power outage.

If you’ve made a payment, please give us some time for this to be reflected.
UsageView.projectedCostMsg:
My bill amount so far:

Your bill amount so far is the amount you have used up until yesterday.

My bill may reach:

This is calculated based on your average daily consumption for the past one (1) month, your actual bill may differ. To find out more, please visit our FAQ page.

Note: The amount shown is before applicable taxes / additional charges.
UsageView.missedReadMsg: Your full usage for this particular day has not been retrieved yet. Check back in a while.
UsageView.emptyDataMsg: Welcome to your usage view! You’ll see your usage here soon.
UsageView.SMOverlayTitle: How do I view my daily usage?
UsageView.SMOverlayMsg: Pinch to zoom in or out! Zoom in to view your daily breakdown.
UsageView.mdmsUnavailableMsg: Your daily usage information is currently unavailable. Check back in a while!
UsageView.tutorialSMRTitle: Your reading status at a glance.
UsageView.tutorialSMRDesc: Get an overview of your reading status here. We’ll also tell you when it’s time to submit your readings.
UsageView.tariffLegendNote: Note: The coloured blocks above represent your electricity rates. For a detailed breakdown, please refer to your bill.
UsageView.prevReadingEmptyTitle: Sorry, we are unable to perform this action right now.
UsageView.prevReadingEmptyMsg: Please try again later. If this problem persists, contact the TNB Careline and we will help you.

Bills.noHistoryData: Looks like you have no bills yet! Once you do, your bills and payment history will appear here.
Bills.bcrmDownMessage: Looks like your page can’t be loaded at the moment. Come back in a while.
Bills.tutorialBillREAcctDesc: Tap “ #dropdown# ” to switch between different accounts. You’ll see how much you have earned or if you’ve been paid extra.
Bills.tutorialBillNormalAcctDesc: Tap “ #dropdown# ” to switch between different accounts. You’ll see how much is due, if you’ve cleared your bill or if you’ve paid extra.
Bills.tutorialPayDesc: Tap here to pay your bill.
Bills.tutorialViewDetailsDesc: ‘View Details’ to review your bill breakdown.
Bills.tutorialHistoryNormalAcctDesc: View and access your bills and payment receipts from the previous six months. Use the filter to see only bills or receipts.
Bills.tutorialHistoryREAcctDesc: View and access your advices and payment receipts from the previous six months. Use the filter to see only advices or receipts.

MandatoryChargesPopUpDetails.Title: This account has a minimum amount to be paid.
MandatoryChargesPopUpDetails.Description: Your service charges like Security Deposit, Processing Fee, Stamp Duty and Meter Cost are required to be cleared first and will be your account’s minimum payment.

MandatoryChargesPopUpDetails.Title: This account has a minimum amount to be paid.
MandatoryChargesPopUpDetails.Description:
You are required to clear {0} from your service charges first.

You may view a breakdown in your bill details.

BillDetails.minimumChargeDescription: This account has a minimum charge.
BillDetails.tooltipdesc1: I need to pay|My outstanding charges|My bill this month (electricity usage only)
BillDetails.tutorialDesc: Tap here to acess the PDF version of your bill.

BillFilter.description: View your invoiced bills, payment receipts or both.

SelectPaymentMethod.title: Select Payment Method
SelectPaymentMethod.cvvFourDigitMessage: Please enter the 4-digit CVV/CVC located at the front of your credit card.
SelectPaymentMethod.cvvThreeDigitMessage: Please enter the 3-digit CVV/CVC located at the back of your credit card.
SelectPaymentMethod.maxCCAmountMessage: For payments more than RM 5000, please use FPX payment mode.

MakePayment.abortMessage: Are you sure you want to abort payment?

PushNotificationList.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
PushNotificationList.deleteAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications?
PushNotificationList.deleteMessageMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete these notifications?
PushNotificationList.noNotification: Looks like you have no notifications at the moment.
PushNotificationList.title: Notifications

AddAccount.noAcctFoundMsg: Please tap on the button below to add your TNB electricity account.
AddAccount.addAccountMsg:
This may take a while as we are
adding your TNB account.
AddAccount.addAccountsMsg:
This may take a while as we are
adding your TNB accounts.
AddAccount.removeAcctMsg: You are about to remove {0}, account number {1}.

PreloginView.tagline: A whole new world with shockingly amazing possibilities.

Onboarding.description1: Track, monitor and stay on top of your electricity usage!
Onboarding.description2: Have easy access to the PDF version of your bills for the past 6 months, all in one place!
Onboarding.description3: Pay your electricity bills while at home, on holiday, on the train – whenever you want to. Say goodbye to late charges and queuing up!
Onboarding.description4: We’ve revamped the Home, Bills and Usage screens! It’s not just prettier, it’s way more helpful with more details (including block tariffs so you can stay informed on all things usage-related).

RearrangeAccount.rearrangeMsg: Looks like you’ve rearranged your accounts. Would you like to keep this new arrangement?
RearrangeAccount.rearrangeToastFailMsg: Uh oh, your changes were not saved. Please try again.
RearrangeAccount.rearrangeToastSuccessMsg: Your new account arrangement has successfully been saved!
